CREATE TABLE car (
    car_vin              VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    car_model            VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    car_color            VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    car_fuel             VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL,
    car_type             VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    car_transmission     VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL,
    car_count_cylinders  INTEGER NOT NULL,
    car_year             INTEGER NOT NULL,
    car_mileage          INTEGER NOT NULL,
    car_condition        VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL,
    car_drive            VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE car ADD CONSTRAINT car_pk PRIMARY KEY ( car_vin );

CREATE TABLE car_model (
    model_name          VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL,
    model_manufactured  VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE car_model ADD CONSTRAINT car_model_pk PRIMARY KEY ( model_name );

CREATE TABLE car_type (
    type_name VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE car_type ADD CONSTRAINT car_type_pk PRIMARY KEY ( type_name );

CREATE TABLE color (
    color_name VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE color ADD CONSTRAINT color_pk PRIMARY KEY ( color_name );

CREATE TABLE count_cylinders (
    count_cylinders INTEGER NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE count_cylinders ADD CONSTRAINT count_cylinders_pk PRIMARY KEY ( count_cylinders );

CREATE TABLE drive (
    drive_name VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE drive ADD CONSTRAINT drve_pk PRIMARY KEY ( drive_name );

CREATE TABLE fuel (
    fuel_name VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE fuel ADD CONSTRAINT fuel_pk PRIMARY KEY ( fuel_name );

CREATE TABLE lot (
    lot_price  INTEGER NOT NULL,
    lot_lat    FLOAT NOT NULL,
    lot_long   FLOAT NOT NULL,
    lot_state  VARCHAR2(5) NOT NULL,
    lot_vin    VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE lot
    ADD CONSTRAINT lot_pk PRIMARY KEY ( lot_price,
                                        lot_lat,
                                        lot_long );

CREATE TABLE manufacturer (
    company_name VARCHAR2(100) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE manufacturer ADD CONSTRAINT manufacturer_pk PRIMARY KEY ( company_name );

CREATE TABLE region (
    region VARCHAR2(50 BYTE) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE region ADD CONSTRAINT region_pk PRIMARY KEY ( region );

CREATE TABLE us_state (
    state_name    VARCHAR2(5) NOT NULL,
    state_region  VARCHAR2(50) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE us_state ADD CONSTRAINT state_pk PRIMARY KEY ( state_name );

CREATE TABLE transmission (
    transmission VARCHAR2(20) NOT NULL
)
LOGGING;

ALTER TABLE transmission ADD CONSTRAINT transmission_pk PRIMARY KEY ( transmission );

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_car_model_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_model )
        REFERENCES car_model ( model_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_car_type_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_type )
        REFERENCES car_type ( type_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_color_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_color )
        REFERENCES color ( color_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_count_cylinders_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_count_cylinders )
        REFERENCES count_cylinders ( count_cylinders )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_drive_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_drive )
        REFERENCES drive ( drive_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_fuel_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_fuel )
        REFERENCES fuel ( fuel_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car_model
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_model_manufacturer_fk FOREIGN KEY ( model_manufactured )
        REFERENCES manufacturer ( company_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE car
    ADD CONSTRAINT car_tranmission_fk FOREIGN KEY ( car_transmission )
        REFERENCES transmission ( transmission )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE lot
    ADD CONSTRAINT lot_car_fk FOREIGN KEY ( lot_vin )
        REFERENCES car ( car_vin )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE lot
    ADD CONSTRAINT lot_state_fk FOREIGN KEY ( lot_state )
        REFERENCES us_state ( state_name )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;

ALTER TABLE us_state
    ADD CONSTRAINT state_region_fk FOREIGN KEY ( state_region )
        REFERENCES region ( region )
    NOT DEFERRABLE;
